text: "And now," said the squire, "you were trotting home to England like a good little boy."

passages.full_quote: "<used>And now," said the squire, "f</used>or the other."
"Now, capta<used>in," said the squire, "you were</used> right, and I was wrong"
"When last I saw you," I s<used>aid, "you were trotting home</used> with your sister, like a good little girl"

passages.fragment: you were trotting home to England like a good little boy
passages.full_quote: "When last I saw you, the day before yesterday, <used>you were trotting home to England like a good little boy</used>"
